articles.title: Mental health conditions, individual and job characteristics and sleep disturbances among firefighters
articles.abstract: This study aimed to assess the associations between mental health conditions, individual and job characteristics and sleep disturbances among firefighters. Of 303 participants, 51.2% reported sleep disturbances. Psychological distress and psychosomatic disturbances were significantly associated with sleep disturbances.

articles.title: Esgotamento entre profissionais da Atenção Primária à Saúde
articles.abstract: O esgotamento profissional (EP) caracteriza-se por exaustão emocional, despersonalização, e baixa realização profissional, podendo ocorrer entre profissionais da saúde. Este artigo avalia o EP entre trabalhadores da Atenção Primária à Saúde (APS) em três municípios de pequeno porte da Zona da Mata Mineira.

articles.title: A deep learning based object identification system for forest fire detection
articles.abstract: Forest fires are still a large concern in several countries. This paper shows the design and validation of a proposed system for the classification of smoke columns with object detection and a deep learning-based approach.

articles.title: Síndrome de Burnout e qualidade de vida de policiais militares e civis
articles.abstract: Este estudo caracterizou e comparou a ocorrência da Síndrome de Burnout (SB) e a Qualidade de Vida Profissional (QVP) entre policiais militares (PMs) e policiais civis (PCs) de Campo Grande-MS, Brasil.

articles.title: Web-based self-help intervention reduces alcohol consumption in both heavy-drinking and dependent alcohol users: a pilot study
articles.abstract: As part of a multicenter project supported by the World Health Organization, we developed a web-based intervention to reduce alcohol use and related problems.
